answers.answer: My sister has pcos and did not get gestational diabetes. She did however, get diabetes a few years after the baby.I have my glucose test next month. I'm personally going to take someone with me.
If I was you I will  take someone with you....I took my glucose test today and when I took the liquid I felt lightheaded...
I have severe PCOS and i did fine...i have the insulin resistance kind...i even take metformin...if your doing the one hour...its a breeze...just take a snack so as soon as it over you can eat!!!
I would take someone with you because taking in all the sugar can make you lightheaded and you dont wanna drive that way

question: So scared, well at least a little. I have pcos, which can lead to diabetes. Anyone have this and been fine? I have my test on Friday and my hubby won't be with me since he can't be off. I'm planning on going alone, is this a bad idea? Should I have someone with me?
title: glucose test
